text: Dorfen is a town in the district of Erding, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 50 km east of Munich and 29 km south of Landshut. == Transportation == Dorfen is at the Munich-Mühldorf railway. == People == * Johann Georg von Dillis (1759–1841), Painter * Hermann Wandinger (1897–1976), Sculptor * Jochen Mass (born 1946), Racing driver * Michael Mittermeier (born 1966), Comedian ==References== Category:Erding (district)
title: Dorfen
